content.prompt: The speaker experiences a tension primarily between

choices.label: the superficiality of the drive-in customers and her own sensitivity to her environment
the artificiality of the drive-in and the reality of the natural world
her desire to please others and her attempt to define her own identity
her satisfaction with her job at the drive-in and her undefined future life

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the function of conflict in a text.
